author: wn.com
title: World’s oldest clock collection finds a new home at the Science Museum (Science Museum)
text: ( Source : Science Museum ) From Friday 23 October the public will be able to see the world's oldest clock and watch collection at its new home in the Science Museum. Moving from Guildhall, London , the Clockmakers' Museum , founded in 1814 ,
